UniprotID	Q7Z6K1
Accession	Q7Z6K1
EntryName	THAP5_HUMAN
ProteinName	THAP domain-containing protein 5
GeneName	THAP5
Length	395
Function	Has sequence-specific DNA-binding activity and can function as transcriptional repressor (in vitro) (PubMed:21110952). May be a regulator of cell cycle: THAP5 overexpression in human cell lines causes cell cycle arrest at G2/M phase (PubMed:19502560).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
